name: Adventure of a Lifetime
overview: Richard Bayliss, "I created an adventure game using the Graphic Adventure Creator and I had not released it, but I still got it. My game 'Adventure Of A Lifetime' wasn't anything serious, but a spoof adventure game, with childish sense of humour in the games. I prefer comedy text adventures to serious ones. I'll release it on a compilation called 'TND Adventures'. Some time Wink"
